All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CommentCreateEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to comment creation from a Kafka topic.
CommentDeleteEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to comment deletion from a Kafka topic.
CommentStatistic
Represents statistical data related to comments in the system.
CommentStatisticController
 
CommentStatisticRepository
Repository interface for managing CommentStatistic entities.
CommentStatisticServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing CommentStatistic entities.
CommentStatisticServiceInterface
Interface for managing and retrieving comment statistics.
KafkaConfig
Configuration class for Apache Kafka.
LikeCommentCreateHandlerImpl
Handles events related to the creation of likes on comments from a Kafka topic.
LikeCommentDeleteEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to the deletion of likes on comments from a Kafka topic.
LikePostCreateEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to the creation of likes on posts from a Kafka topic.
LikePostDeleteEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to the deletion of likes on posts from a Kafka topic.
LikeStatistic
Represents statistical data related to likes in the system.
LikeStatisticController
 
LikeStatisticRepository
Repository interface for managing LikeStatistic entities.
LikeStatisticServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing LikeStatistic entities.
LikeStatisticServiceInterface
Interface for managing and retrieving like statistics.
LoggingAspect
Aspect for centralized logging of application methods.
MediaDeleteEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to the deletion of media from a Kafka topic.
MediaStatistic
Represents statistical data related to media operations in the system.
MediaStatisticController
 
MediaStatisticRepository
Repository interface for managing MediaStatistic entities.
MediaStatisticServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing MediaStatistic entities.
MediaStatisticServiceInterface
Interface for managing and retrieving media statistics.
MediaUploadEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to the upload of media from a Kafka topic.
PostCreateEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to the creation of posts from a Kafka topic.
PostDeleteEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to the deletion of posts from a Kafka topic.
PostStatistic
Represents statistical data related to posts in the system.
PostStatisticController
 
PostStatisticRepository
Repository interface for managing PostStatistic entities.
PostStatisticServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing PostStatistic entities.
PostStatisticServiceInterface
Interface for managing and retrieving post statistics.
StatisticNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a specific statistic cannot be found.
StatisticServiceApplication
The main class for starting the Statistic Service application.
SwaggerConfig
Configuration class for Swagger API documentation.
UserCreateEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to the creation of users from a Kafka topic.
UserDeleteEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to the deletion of users from a Kafka topic.
UserStatistic
Represents statistical data related to user activities in the system.
UserStatisticController
 
UserStatisticRepository
Repository interface for managing UserStatistic entities.
UserStatisticServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing UserStatistic entities.
UserStatisticServiceInterface
Interface for managing and retrieving user statistics.
